timeline.message: Let successful RemoveReponse and UpdateRespone have NOT_FOUND outcome
Provide a MessageBugDocumentAccess lazily, in containers

timeline.bodyText: Why creating it at all if shutdown is set. Can you just add it to the outer if as '&& !shutDown'
timeline.author: baldersheim

replies.bodyText: Then you'd return null. I thought it better to preserve the existing error message you'd get when trying to use a shut down document access.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Alternatively could throw something custom that was clear on this.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText:
Throw instead, no point in constructing mbus access and shut it down just to preserve error message in this case.
This should never happen, but throwing is probably a good idea.
replies.author: baldersheim

replies.bodyText: Can do. 'twas my first impulse as well. And, yes, this should never happen, unless someone breaks DI.
replies.author: jonmv

timeline.bodyText: IMHO, throwing an exception for duplicate calls to deconstruct() is ok - it should not happen. This is too defensive.
timeline.author: bjorncs

timeline.bodyText: Is this config available for all types of container clusters (e.g clustercontroller, metricsproxy, logserver)?
timeline.author: bjorncs

timeline.bodyText: Should this component be available for non-application-container-clusters?
timeline.author: bjorncs
